about_the_game:
The Crossing Souls original soundtrack by Chris Köbke & Timecop1983 provided as high quality MP3 files.

Duration: 1:19:58

Track Listing

1. Fourattic And Devolver Digital Presents (by Timecop1983)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher /Linux Mint 18.3 / Linux Mint Debian Edition x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (256 MB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (256 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Crossing Souls Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
